00125     {
00126       if (mPercentOfDietThatIsFromCrops < 0)
00127       {
00128         return 0;
00129       }
00130       else if (mPercentOfDietThatIsFromCrops > 100)
00131       {
00132         return 100;
00133       }
00134       else
00135       {
00136         return mPercentOfDietThatIsFromCrops;
00137       }
00138     }

00183 bool LaModel::fromXml(QString theXml)
00184 {
00185   logMessage("method ==> bool LaModel::fromXml(QString theXml)");
00186   QString myFlag;
00187   logMessage("Loading model from xml");
00188   QDomDocument myDocument("mydocument");
00189   myDocument.setContent(theXml);
00190   QDomElement myTopElement = myDocument.firstChildElement("model");
00191   if (myTopElement.isNull())
00192   {
00193     //TODO - just make this a warning
00194     logMessage("top element could not be found!");
00195   }
00196   logMessage("Model::fromXml - guid found : " + myTopElement.attribute("guid").toLocal8Bit());
00197   setGuid(myTopElement.attribute("guid"));
00198   logMessage("Model::fromXml - guid set to : " + guid().toLocal8Bit());
00199   mName=LaUtils::xmlDecode(myTopElement.firstChildElement("name").text());
00200   mPopulation=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("population").text()).toInt();
00201   mPeriod=LaUtils::xmlDecode(myTopElement.firstChildElement("period").text());
00202   mProjection=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("projection").text()).toInt();
00203   mEasting=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("easting").text()).toInt();
00204   mNorthing=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("northing").text()).toInt();
00205   myFlag = myTopElement.firstChildElement("euclideanDistance").text();
00206   if (myFlag=="1")
00207   {
00208     mEuclideanDistance=true;
00209   }
00210   else
00211   {
00212     mEuclideanDistance=false;
00213   }
00214   myFlag = myTopElement.firstChildElement("walkingTime").text();
00215   if (myFlag=="1")
00216   {
00217     mWalkingTime=true;
00218   }
00219   else
00220   {
00221     mWalkingTime=false;
00222   }
00223   myFlag = myTopElement.firstChildElement("pathDistance").text();
00224   if (myFlag=="1")
00225   {
00226     mPathDistance=true;
00227   }
00228   else
00229   {
00230     mPathDistance=false;
00231   }
00232   mPrecision=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("precision").text()).toInt();
00233   mDietPercent=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("dietPercent").text()).toInt();
00234   mPercentOfDietThatIsFromCrops=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("plantPercent").text()).toInt();
00235   mMeatPercent=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("meatPercent").text()).toInt();
00236   mCaloriesPerPersonDaily=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("caloriesPerPersonDaily").text()).toInt();
00237   mDairyUse=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("dairyUse").text()).toInt();
00238   return true;
00239 }

00241 QString LaModel::toXml()
00242 {
00243   logMessage("method ==> QString LaModel::toXml()");
00244   QString myString;
00245   myString+=QString("<model guid=\"" + guid() + "\">\n");
00246   myString+=QString("  <name>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mName) + "</name>\n");
00247   myString+=QString("  <population>" + QString::number(mPopulation) + "</population>\n");
00248   myString+=QString("  <period>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mPeriod) + "</period>\n");
00249   myString+=QString("  <projection>" + QString::number(mProjection) + "</projection>\n");
00250   myString+=QString("  <easting>" + QString::number(mEasting) + "</easting>\n");
00251   myString+=QString("  <northing>" + QString::number(mNorthing) + "</northing>\n");
00252   myString+=QString("  <euclideanDistance>" + QString::number(mEuclideanDistance) + "</euclideanDistance>\n");
00253   myString+=QString("  <walkingTime>" + QString::number(mWalkingTime) + "</walkingTime>\n");
00254   myString+=QString("  <pathDistance>" + QString::number(mPathDistance) + "</pathDistance>\n");
00255   myString+=QString("  <precision>" + QString::number(mPrecision) + "</precision>\n");
00256   myString+=QString("  <dietPercent>" + QString::number(mDietPercent) + "</dietPercent>\n");
00257   myString+=QString("  <plantPercent>" + QString::number(mPercentOfDietThatIsFromCrops) + "</plantPercent>\n");
00258   myString+=QString("  <meatPercent>" + QString::number(mMeatPercent) + "</meatPercent>\n");
00259   myString+=QString("  <caloriesPerPersonDaily>" + QString::number(mCaloriesPerPersonDaily) + "</caloriesPerPersonDaily>\n");
00260   myString+=QString("  <dairyUse>" + QString::number(mDairyUse) + "</dairyUse>\n");
00261   myString+=QString("</model>\n");
00262   return myString;
00263 }

00288 QString LaModel::toHtml()
00289 {
00290   logMessage("method ==> QString LaModel::toHtml()");
00291   QString myString;
00292   myString+="<h1>Model Report</h1>";
00293   myString+="<h3>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mName) + "</h3>";
00294   //myString+="GUID:" + guid() + "<br />";
00295   myString+="<br>Population:" + QString::number(mPopulation) + "</br>";
00296   myString+="<br>Period: " + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mPeriod) + "</br>";
00297   myString+="<br>Projection: " + QString::number(mProjection) + "</br>";
00298   myString+="<br>Easting: " + QString::number(mEasting) + "</br>";
00299   myString+="<br>Northing: " + QString::number(mNorthing) + "</br>";
00300   myString+="<br>Euclidean Distance: " + QString::number(mEuclideanDistance) + "</br>";
00301   myString+="<br>Walking Time: " + QString::number(mWalkingTime) + "</br>";
00302   myString+="<br>Path Distance: " + QString::number(mPathDistance) + "</br>";
00303   myString+="<br>Precision: " + QString::number(mPrecision) + "</br>";
00304   myString+="<br>Diet Percent" + QString::number(mDietPercent) + "</br>";
00305   myString+="<br>Plant Percent: " + QString::number(mPercentOfDietThatIsFromCrops) + "</br>";
00306   myString+="<br>Meat Percent: " + QString::number(mMeatPercent) + "</br>";
00307   myString+="<br>Calories Per Person Daily: " + QString::number(mCaloriesPerPersonDaily) + "</br>";
00308   myString+="<br>Dairy Use: " + QString::number(mDairyUse) + "</br>";
00309   //iterate through animals
00310   QMapIterator<QString, QString > myAnimalIterator(mAnimalsMap);
00311   while (myAnimalIterator.hasNext())
00312   {
00313     myAnimalIterator.next();
00314     QString myAnimalGuid = myAnimalIterator.key();
00315     QString myAnimalParameterGuid = myAnimalIterator.value();
00316     //QString myText = "Animal " + myAnimalGuid.toLocal8Bit() +
00317     //  " , ";
00318     //myText +=  myAnimalParameterGuid.toLocal8Bit() ;
00319     //myText += " ";
00320     //myString += myText + "<br />";
00321     LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(myAnimalGuid);
00322     myString += "<br>";
00323     myString += myAnimal.toHtml();
00324     myString += "</br>";
00325     LaAnimalParameter myParameter = LaUtils::getAnimalParameter(myAnimalParameterGuid);
00326     myString += "<br>";
00327     myString += myParameter.toHtml();
00328     myString += "</br>";
00329   }
00330 
00331   //iterate through crops
00332   QMapIterator<QString, QString > myCropIterator(mCropsMap);
00333   while (myCropIterator.hasNext())
00334   {
00335     myCropIterator.next();
00336     QString myCropGuid = myCropIterator.key();
00337     QString myCropParameterGuid = myCropIterator.value();
00338     //QString myText = "Crop " + myCropGuid.toLocal8Bit() +
00339     //  " , ";
00340     //myText += myCropParameterGuid.toLocal8Bit() ;
00341     //myText += " ";
00342     //myString += myText + "<br />";
00343     LaCrop myCrop = LaUtils::getCrop(myCropGuid);
00344     myString += myCrop.toHtml();
00345     myString += "<br />";
00346     LaCropParameter myParameter = LaUtils::getCropParameter(myCropParameterGuid);
00347     myString += myParameter.toHtml();
00348     myString += "<br />";
00349   }
00350   return myString;
00351 }

00359 void LaModel::clearCalcMaps()
00360 {

00362   mCalcsCropsMap.clear();

00364 
00365 void LaModel::DoCalculations()
00366 {
00367   mCalcsAnimalsMap.clear();
00368   mCalcsCropsMap.clear();
00369   //logMessage("method ==> void LaModel::DoCalculations()");
00370   // Step 1
00371   //        Calculate calories needed from crops and tame meat to sustain the settlement
00372   //        available here -->  caloriesFromCrops();
00373   //        available here -->  caloriesFromTameMeat();
00374 
00375   // Step 2
00376   //        Calculate calorie targets for each crop and each animal
00377   //        (These results will be stored in a QMap)
00378   initialiseCaloriesProvidedByMeatMap();
00379   initialiseCaloriesProvidedByMilkMap();
00380   initialiseCaloriesProvidedByCropsMap();
00381   
00382   // Step 3
00383   //        Now we need to calculate how many calories the animals
00384   //          are going to need to stay alive.
00385   //        (These calculations are going to be stored in a QMap)
00386   initialiseValueMap();
00387 
00388   // Step 4
00389   //        Production targets must now be calculated for each animal and crop
00390   //        Animals first, because if the animals are fed grain, it will
00391   //          increase the production targets of the crops
00392   initialiseProductionRequiredAnimalsMap();
00393   initialiseProductionRequiredCropsMap();
00394 
00395   // Step 5
00396   //        Area targets for crops are calculated and stored in a QMap
00397   //        These calculations will produce values for the amount of
00398   //          fallow land available for grazing, which will in turn
00399   //          be used to reduce the amount of calories which the animals
00400   //          who graze the fallow land need from specific grazing land.
00401   initialiseAreaTargetsCropsMap();
00402 
00403   // Step 6
00404   //        If there is available fallow cropland for any animals to
00405   //          graze, it needs to be allocated to the animals accordingly
00406   //          to their access priority, and their total calorific
00407   //          requirements will be reduced to reflect this 'already
00408   //          counted for' land.
00409   allocateFallowGrazingLand();
00410 
00411   // Step 7
00412   //        If there are additional feed requirements for any animals we
00413   //          now need to check to see if they receive calories from fodder.
00414   //        If they do get fed fodder, this is the process that gets followed:
00415   //          1)  They get fed straw and chaff first, as it is less costly
00416   //              to the settlement than feeding them the grain.  If there is
00417   //              enough calories provided by the straw/chaff fodder to satisfy
00418   //              their remaining calorific needs, there is no need to search
00419   //              for any additional grazing land, so that animals area target
00420   //              needs to be set to zero.
00421   //          2)  If the straw/chaff doesn't satisfy their feeding requirements,
00422   //              then the same process as above is followed, but considering
00423   //              of course the grain in this step.  However, at this point, if
00424   //              grain is being used, the amount of that grain needs to be added
00425   //              onto the prodction level requirement of the crop. (Step 7)
00426   adjustAnimalTargetsForFodder();
00427 
00428   // Step 8
00429   //        Adjust the production levels of the crops to reflect any increases in
00430   //          demand resulting from grain being used to feed animals.
00431   //        adjustCropProductionForFodder(); // implement later
00432   //
00433   // Step 8
00434   //        Calculate area targets for the animals based on their final
00435   //          calorific requirements after considering fallow grazing
00436   //          and the use of fodder as feed.
00437   initialiseAreaTargetsAnimalsMap();
00438   initialiseCalcsAnimalsMap();
00439   initialiseCalcsCropsMap();
00440 }
00441 
00442 
00443 
00444 void LaModel::adjustAnimalTargetsForFodder()
00445 {
00446   //logMessage("method ==> void LaModel::adjustAnimalTargetsForFodder()");
00447   // after serious consideration, I have decided to implement fodder later.
00448   // it is not as important as getting the rest of the project working.
00449 }
00450 int LaModel::caloriesFromCrops()
00451 {
00452   float myCaloriesFromDairyProducts=caloriesFromDairyProducts();
00453   float myCaloriesFromMeat=caloriesFromTameMeat();
00454   float myCropPercent = 0.01 * ( plantPercent() );
00455   float myCaloriesFromAnimals = myCaloriesFromDairyProducts + myCaloriesFromMeat;
00456   float myCalorieTarget = (population() * (mCaloriesPerPersonDaily/1000.) * 365.) - myCaloriesFromDairyProducts - myCaloriesFromAnimals; // kcalories
00457   float myCropCalorieTarget = myCalorieTarget * myCropPercent;
00458   int myReturnValue = static_cast<int> (myCropCalorieTarget);
00459   logMessage("Overall Crop Calorie Target: " + QString::number(myReturnValue).toLocal8Bit());
00460   return myReturnValue;
00461 }
00462 
00463 int LaModel::caloriesFromTameMeat()
00464 {
00465   float myDietComposition=0.01*dietPercent();
00466   float myMeatPercent=0.01*meatPercent();
00467   float myAnimalOverallContributionToDiet=myDietComposition * myMeatPercent;
00468   float myCalorieTarget= population() * (mCaloriesPerPersonDaily/1000.) * 365.; // kcalories
00469   float myTameMeatCalorieTarget=myCalorieTarget * myAnimalOverallContributionToDiet;
00470   int myReturnValue = static_cast<int>(myTameMeatCalorieTarget);
00471   //logMessage("method ==> int LaModel::caloriesFromTameMeat()");
00472   logMessage("Overall Tame Meat Target: " + QString::number(myReturnValue).toLocal8Bit());
00473   return myReturnValue;
00474 }
00475 
00476 int LaModel::caloriesFromMilk(QString theAnimalGuid) // need to know total number of mothers in the herd
00477 {
00478   HerdSize myHerdSize=herdSize(theAnimalGuid); // myHerdSize.first==mothers myHerdSize.second==juveniles
00479   qDebug() << "HERDSIZE = " << myHerdSize;
00480   
00481   LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(theAnimalGuid);
00482   
00483   qDebug() << "theAnimalGuid = " << theAnimalGuid;
00484   qDebug() << "AnimalName: = " << myAnimal.name();
00485 
00486   float myDairyUse=0.01*dairyUse();
00487   float myMothers = myHerdSize.first;
00488   int myMilkGramsPerDay = myAnimal.milkGramsPerDay();
00489   int myMilkFoodValue = myAnimal.milkFoodValue();
00490   int myDaysLactating = myAnimal.lactationTime();
00491     
00492   qDebug() << "myMilkGramsPerDay = " << myMilkGramsPerDay;
00493   qDebug() << "myMilkFoodValue = " << myMilkFoodValue;
00494   qDebug() << "myDairyUse = " << myDairyUse;
00495   qDebug() << "myMothers = " << myMothers;
00496   qDebug() << "myDaysLactating = " << myDaysLactating;
00497 
00498   float myCaloriesFromMilk= (myDairyUse * myMothers * myMilkGramsPerDay
00499       * myDaysLactating * myMilkFoodValue)/1000.; // Mcalories
00500   
00501   int myReturnValue = static_cast<int>(myCaloriesFromMilk);
00502   //logMessage("method ==> int LaModel::caloriesFromTameMeat()");
00503   qDebug() << "Calories From Milk Return Value: " << myReturnValue;
00504   return myReturnValue;
00505 }
00506 
00507 int LaModel::countCrops()
00508 {
00509   //logMessage("method ==> int LaModel::countCrops()");
00510   int myCropCounter=0;
00511   //iterate through crops
00512   QMapIterator<QString, QString > myCropIterator(mCropsMap);
00513   while (myCropIterator.hasNext())
00514   {
00515     myCropIterator.next();
00516     QString myCropGuid = myCropIterator.key();
00517     QString myCropParameterGuid = myCropIterator.value();
00518     LaCrop myCrop = LaUtils::getCrop(myCropGuid);
00519     LaCropParameter myCropParameter = LaUtils::getCropParameter(myCropParameterGuid);
00520     myCropCounter++;
00521   }
00522   //logMessage("method ==> int LaModel::countCrops()");
00523   //logMessage("Crop Count: " + QString::number(myCropCounter).toLocal8Bit());
00524   return myCropCounter;
00525 }
00526 
00527 int LaModel::countAnimals()
00528 {
00529   int myAnimalCounter=0;
00530   //iterate through animals
00531   QMapIterator<QString, QString > myAnimalIterator(mAnimalsMap);
00532   while (myAnimalIterator.hasNext())
00533   {
00534     myAnimalIterator.next();
00535     QString myAnimalGuid = myAnimalIterator.key();
00536     QString myAnimalParameterGuid = myAnimalIterator.value();
00537     LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(myAnimalGuid);
00538     LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter = LaUtils::getAnimalParameter(myAnimalParameterGuid);
00539     myAnimalCounter++;
00540   }
00541   //logMessage("method ==> int LaModel::countAnimals()");
00542   //logMessage("Animal Count: " + QString::number(myAnimalCounter).toLocal8Bit());
00543 
00544   return myAnimalCounter;
00545 }
00546 int LaModel::caloriesFromDairyProducts()
00547 {
00548   int myCalorieTotal=0;
00549   //iterate through animals
00550   QMapIterator<QString, QString > myAnimalIterator(mAnimalsMap);
00551   while (myAnimalIterator.hasNext())
00552   {
00553     myAnimalIterator.next();
00554     QString myAnimalGuid = myAnimalIterator.key();
00555     QString myAnimalParameterGuid = myAnimalIterator.value();
00556     LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(myAnimalGuid);
00557     LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter = LaUtils::getAnimalParameter(myAnimalParameterGuid);
00558     myCalorieTotal+=myAnimal.milkFoodValue()*myAnimal.milkGramsPerDay()*1000;//converts grams to Kg (by *1000)
00559   }
00560   logMessage("method ==> int LaModel::caloriesFromDairyProducts()");
00561   logMessage("myCalorieTotal: " + QString::number(myCalorieTotal).toLocal8Bit());
00562 
00563   return myCalorieTotal;
00564 }
00565 int LaModel::caloriesProvidedByTheCrop(QString theCropParameterGuid)
00566 {
00567   LaCropParameter myCropParameter = LaUtils::getCropParameter(theCropParameterGuid);
00568   
00569   float myCaloriesFromDairyProducts=caloriesFromDairyProducts();
00570   float myCaloriesFromMeat=caloriesFromTameMeat();
00571   float myCaloriesFromAnimals = myCaloriesFromDairyProducts + myCaloriesFromMeat;
00572   float myCropPercent = 0.01 * ( plantPercent() );
00573   float myCropCalorieTarget = (population() * (mCaloriesPerPersonDaily/1000.) * 365.) - (myCaloriesFromDairyProducts/1000.) - (myCaloriesFromAnimals/1000.); // kcalories
00574   //float myCropCalorieTarget = myCalorieTarget * myCropPercent;
00575 
00576   int myReturnValue = static_cast<int>(myCropCalorieTarget);
00578   //logMessage("method ==> int LaModel::caloriesProvidedByTheCrop(QString theCropParameterGuid)");
00579   logMessage("Crop Parameter Guid that was passed here: " + theCropParameterGuid.toLocal8Bit());
00580   logMessage("Crop Parameter Name: " + myCropParameter.name().toLocal8Bit());
00581   logMessage("myCropParameter.percentTameCrop() is giving a result of:" + QString::number(myCropParameter.percentTameCrop()).toLocal8Bit());
00582   logMessage("crop percent: " + QString::number(myCropPercent).toLocal8Bit());
00583   logMessage("Calorie Target float: " + QString::number(myCropCalorieTarget).toLocal8Bit());
00584   logMessage("Calorie Target int: " + QString::number(myReturnValue).toLocal8Bit());
00585   return myReturnValue;
00586 }
00587 
00588 int LaModel::caloriesProvidedByTheMeatOfTheAnimal(QString theAnimalParameterGuid)
00589 {
00590   LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter = LaUtils::getAnimalParameter(theAnimalParameterGuid);
00591   float myAnimalPercent = 0.01 * myAnimalParameter.percentTameMeat();
00592   float myAnimalCalorieTarget = caloriesFromTameMeat() * myAnimalPercent;
00593   int myReturnValue = static_cast<int>(myAnimalCalorieTarget);
00595   logMessage("method ==> int LaModel::caloriesProvidedByTheMeatOfTheAnimal(QString theAnimalParameterGuid)");
00596   logMessage("Animal Parameter Guid: " + myAnimalParameter.guid().toLocal8Bit());
00597   logMessage("Animal Parameter Name: " + myAnimalParameter.name().toLocal8Bit());
00598   logMessage("Calorie Target: " + QString::number(myReturnValue).toLocal8Bit());
00599   return myReturnValue;
00600 }
00601 
00602 int LaModel::caloriesProvidedByTheMilkOfTheAnimal(QString theAnimalParameterGuid , QString theAnimalGuid)
00603 {
00604   LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter = LaUtils::getAnimalParameter(theAnimalParameterGuid);
00605   float myDairyUse = 0.01 * mDairyUse;
00606   int myCaloriesFromMilk = caloriesFromMilk(theAnimalGuid);
00607   float myMilkCalories =  myCaloriesFromMilk * myDairyUse;
00608   
00609   int myReturnValue = static_cast<int>(myMilkCalories);
00611   qDebug() << "   LaModel::caloriesProvidedByTheMilkOfTheAnimal(QString theAnimalParameterGuid , QString theAnimalGuid)" << myDairyUse;
00612 
00613   qDebug() << "   myDairyUse: " << myDairyUse;
00614   qDebug() << "   myMilkCalories: " << myMilkCalories;
00615 
00616   qDebug() << "   Animal Parameter Guid: " << myAnimalParameter.guid();
00617   qDebug() << "   Animal Parameter Name: " << myAnimalParameter.name();
00618   qDebug() << "   Calories from milk: " << QString::number(myReturnValue);
00619   return myReturnValue;
00620 }
00621 
00622 int LaModel::getProductionTargetsCrops(QString theCropGuid, int theCalorieTarget)
00623 {
00624   LaCrop myCrop = LaUtils::getCrop(theCropGuid);
00625   int myAnimalsRequiredCalories = 0;
00626   //int myCropFoodValue = 0;
00627   //int myFodderFoodValue= 0;
00628   
00629   QMapIterator<QString, QString > myAnimalIterator(mAnimalsMap);
00630   while (myAnimalIterator.hasNext())
00631   {
00632     myAnimalIterator.next();
00633     QString myAnimalGuid = myAnimalIterator.key();
00634     LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter;
00635     LaFoodSourceMap myFoodSourceMap = myAnimalParameter.fodderSourceMap();// this loads the map for the animal
00636     //LaFoodSource myFoodSourceCropInfo = myFoodSourceMap.value(myAnimalGuid);
00637     
00638     //int myFodderValue = myFoodSource.fodder();
00639     int myGrainGrams = myFoodSourceMap.value(theCropGuid).grain(); //this gives me the 
00640       //int myFodderGrams = myFoodSource.fodder(); //this gives me grams of straw per day
00641     //now I have to look up the food value of the grain and the straw from LaCrop
00642     int myGrainValue = myCrop.cropCalories();
00643       //int myFodderValue = myCrop.fodderValue();
00644     // now I have to calculate how many calories this all works out to
00645     int myTotalCaloriesFromGrain = myGrainGrams * 1000 * myGrainValue;
00646     myAnimalsRequiredCalories+=myTotalCaloriesFromGrain;
00647   }
00648   
00649   mCalcsAnimalsMap.insert("Common Land", QString::number(mCommonGrazingLandAreaTarget));
00650   int myCalorieTarget = theCalorieTarget + myAnimalsRequiredCalories;
00651   float myCropProductionTarget = myCalorieTarget / (myCrop.cropCalories() / 1000.); //kcalories
00652   int myReturnValue = static_cast<int>(myCropProductionTarget);
00654   logMessage("method ==> int LaModel::getProductionTargetsCrops(QString theCropGuid, int theCalorieTarget)");
00655   logMessage("Crop Guid: " + myCrop.guid().toLocal8Bit());
00656   logMessage("Crop Name: " + myCrop.name().toLocal8Bit());
00657   logMessage("Production Target: " + QString::number(myReturnValue).toLocal8Bit());
00658   return myReturnValue;
00659 }
00660 
00661 int LaModel::getProductionTargetsAnimals(QString theAnimalGuid, int theCalorieTarget)
00662 {
00663   LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(theAnimalGuid);
00664   float myAnimalProductionTarget = (theCalorieTarget / (myAnimal.meatFoodValue()/1000.)) / (0.01 * myAnimal.usableMeat()); // kcalories
00665   int myReturnValue = static_cast<int>(myAnimalProductionTarget);
00667   logMessage("method ==> int LaModel::getProductionTargetsAnimals(QString theAnimalGuid, int theCalorieTarget)");
00668   logMessage("Animal Guid: " + myAnimal.guid().toLocal8Bit());
00669   logMessage("Animal Name: " + myAnimal.name().toLocal8Bit());
00670   logMessage("Production Target: " + QString::number(myReturnValue).toLocal8Bit());
00671   return myReturnValue;
00672 }
00673 
00674 int LaModel::getAreaTargetsCrops(QString theCropGuid, int theProductionTarget)
00675 {
00676   LaCrop myCrop = LaUtils::getCrop(theCropGuid);
00677   AreaUnits myAreaUnits = myCrop.areaUnits();
00678   qDebug() << "    LaModel::getAreaTargetsCrops AreaUnits== " << myAreaUnits;
00679   int myCropYieldHectares = LaUtils::convertAreaToHectares(myAreaUnits, myCrop.cropYield());
00680   QString myCropParameterGuid = mCropsMap.value(theCropGuid);
00681   LaCropParameter myCropParameter = LaUtils::getCropParameter(myCropParameterGuid);
00682   float myFallowRatio = myCropParameter.fallowRatio();
00683   float myCropAreaTarget = (theProductionTarget / myCropYieldHectares) * (1.0 + myFallowRatio);
00684   int myReturnValue = static_cast<int>(myCropAreaTarget);
00685 
00687   logMessage("method ==> int LaModel::getAreaTargetsCrops(QString theCropGuid, int theProductionTarget)");
00688   logMessage("Crop Guid: " + myCrop.guid().toLocal8Bit());
00689   logMessage("Crop Name: " + myCrop.name().toLocal8Bit());
00690   logMessage("Area Target is the production target of: " + QString::number(theProductionTarget).toLocal8Bit());
00691   logMessage(" Divided by the crop yield of " + QString::number(myCropYieldHectares).toLocal8Bit());
00692   logMessage(" which gives a result of: " + QString::number(myReturnValue).toLocal8Bit());
00693   logMessage("before adjusting, value yield was: " + QString::number(myCrop.cropYield()).toLocal8Bit());
00694   logMessage("after adjusting for area units, yield was: " + QString::number(myCropYieldHectares).toLocal8Bit());
00695 
00696 return myReturnValue;
00697 }
00698 
00699 int LaModel::requiredValue(QString theAnimalGuid)
00700 { // this is the generic animal model
00701   LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(theAnimalGuid);
00702   float myAnimalProductionTarget = getProductionTargetsAnimals (theAnimalGuid, static_cast <int> (mCaloriesProvidedByMeatMap.value (theAnimalGuid)));
00703 
00704 
00705   float myAnimalsRequired=(myAnimalProductionTarget / myAnimal.killWeight()) / (myAnimal.usableMeat()*.01);
00706   float myBirthsPerYear = 365.0 / (myAnimal.gestationTime() + myAnimal.estrousCycle() + (myAnimal.weaningAge() * 7.0));
00707   float myOffspringPerMotherYearly = myBirthsPerYear * myAnimal.youngPerBirth() * (1.0-(0.01*myAnimal.deathRate()));
00708   float myMothersNeededStepOne = myAnimalsRequired/myOffspringPerMotherYearly;
00709   float myMalesStepOne = (myMothersNeededStepOne * myOffspringPerMotherYearly)/2;
00710   float myFemalesStepOne = myMalesStepOne;
00711   float myMotherReplacementsPerYear = myMothersNeededStepOne/myAnimal.breedingExpectancy();
00712   float myAdditionalMothers = (myMotherReplacementsPerYear/myOffspringPerMotherYearly)*2;
00713   float myMalesStepTwo = (myAdditionalMothers*myOffspringPerMotherYearly)/2;
00714   float myFemalesStepTwo = (myAdditionalMothers*myOffspringPerMotherYearly)/2;
00715   float myTotalMothers = myMothersNeededStepOne+myAdditionalMothers;
00716   float myTotalMales = myMalesStepOne+myMalesStepTwo;
00717   float myTotalFemales = myFemalesStepOne-myFemalesStepTwo;
00718   float myTotalJuveniles = myTotalMales+myTotalFemales;
00719   float myTotalMothersValueRequired = myTotalMothers * myAnimal.gestating();
00720   float myTotalJuvenilesValueRequired = myTotalJuveniles * myAnimal.juvenile();
00721   float myValueNeededToFeedAnimals = myTotalMothersValueRequired + myTotalJuvenilesValueRequired;
00722   int myReturnValue = static_cast<int>(myValueNeededToFeedAnimals);
00723 
00724   // log report
00725   logMessage("method ==> int LaModel::requiredValue(QString theAnimalGuid)");
00726   logMessage("animal prodn target = calorie target of animal / food value");
00727   logMessage("mCaloriesProvidedByMeatMap.value(theAnimalGuid): " + QString::number(mCaloriesProvidedByMeatMap.value(theAnimalGuid)).toLocal8Bit());
00728   logMessage("myAnimal.meatFoodValue(): " + QString::number(myAnimal.meatFoodValue()/1000.).toLocal8Bit());
00729   logMessage("myAnimalProductionTarget = " + QString::number(myAnimalProductionTarget).toLocal8Bit());
00730   logMessage("slaughter animals reqd: " + QString::number(myAnimalsRequired).toLocal8Bit());
00731   logMessage("BirthEventsPerYear: " + QString::number(myBirthsPerYear).toLocal8Bit());
00732   logMessage("OffspringPerMotherYearly = " + QString::number(myOffspringPerMotherYearly).toLocal8Bit());
00733   logMessage("MothersNeededStepOne = " + QString::number(myMothersNeededStepOne).toLocal8Bit());
00734   logMessage("MalesStepOne = " + QString::number(myMalesStepOne).toLocal8Bit());
00735   logMessage("FemalesStepOne = " + QString::number(myFemalesStepOne).toLocal8Bit());
00736   logMessage("MotherReplacementsPerYear = " + QString::number(myMotherReplacementsPerYear).toLocal8Bit());
00737   logMessage("AdditionalMothers = " + QString::number(myAdditionalMothers).toLocal8Bit());
00738   logMessage("MalesStepTwo = " + QString::number(myMalesStepTwo).toLocal8Bit());
00739   logMessage("FemalesStepTwo = " + QString::number(myFemalesStepTwo).toLocal8Bit());
00740   logMessage("TotalMothers = " + QString::number(myTotalMothers).toLocal8Bit());
00741   logMessage("TotalMales = " + QString::number(myTotalMales).toLocal8Bit());
00742   logMessage("TotalFemales = " + QString::number(myTotalFemales).toLocal8Bit());
00743   logMessage("TotalJuveniles = " + QString::number(myTotalJuveniles).toLocal8Bit());
00744   logMessage("Total Adult Females Value(Kg) = " + QString::number (myTotalMothersValueRequired).toLocal8Bit());
00745   logMessage("Total Juveniles Value(Kg) = " + QString::number (myTotalJuvenilesValueRequired).toLocal8Bit());
00746   logMessage("Total Value (Kg) Needed To Feed Animals = " + QString::number(myValueNeededToFeedAnimals).toLocal8Bit());
00747   logMessage("method ==> int LaModel::requiredValue(QString theAnimalGuid)");
00748   logMessage("Animal: " + myAnimal.name().toLocal8Bit());
00749   logMessage("Breeding Stock: " + QString::number(myTotalMothers).toLocal8Bit());
00750   logMessage("Juveniles: " + QString::number(myTotalJuveniles).toLocal8Bit());
00751   logMessage("Kg Value needed annually to feed the entire herd: " +
00752       QString::number(myReturnValue).toLocal8Bit());
00753   logMessage("^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^");
00754   return myReturnValue;
00755 }

00759   LaCrop myCrop = LaUtils::getCrop(theCropGuid);
00760 
00761   QString myReport;
00762   myReport += "Details for " + myCrop.name();
00763   myReport += "\n";
00764   myReport += "Calorie Target: " + QString::number(mCaloriesProvidedByCropsMap.value(theCropGuid));
00765   myReport += "\n";
00766   myReport += "Prod'n Target(Kg): " + QString::number(mProductionRequiredCropsMap.value(theCropGuid));
00767   myReport += "\n";
00768   myReport += "Area Target: " + QString::number(mAreaTargetsCropsMap.value(theCropGuid));

00770

00774 
00775 //HerdSize is typedef QPair <int AdultFemales , Juveniles>
00776 HerdSize LaModel::herdSize(QString theAnimalGuid) 
00777 { // this is the animal model calculation results
00778   QString myReport;
00779   HerdSize myHerdSize;
00780   LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(theAnimalGuid);
00781   float myAnimalProductionTarget=getProductionTargetsAnimals( theAnimalGuid, static_cast <int>(mCaloriesProvidedByMeatMap.value(theAnimalGuid)));
00782   float myAnimalsRequired=(myAnimalProductionTarget / myAnimal.killWeight()) / (myAnimal.usableMeat()*.01);
00783   float myBirthsPerYear = 365.0 / (myAnimal.gestationTime() + myAnimal.estrousCycle() + (myAnimal.weaningAge() * 7.0));
00784   float myOffspringPerMotherYearly = myBirthsPerYear * myAnimal.youngPerBirth() * (1.0-(0.01*myAnimal.deathRate()));
00785   float myMothersNeededStepOne = myAnimalsRequired/myOffspringPerMotherYearly;
00786   float myMalesStepOne = (myMothersNeededStepOne * myOffspringPerMotherYearly)/2;
00787   float myFemalesStepOne = myMalesStepOne;
00788   float myMotherReplacementsPerYear = myMothersNeededStepOne/myAnimal.breedingExpectancy();
00789   float myAdditionalMothers = (myMotherReplacementsPerYear/myOffspringPerMotherYearly)*2;
00790   float myMalesStepTwo = (myAdditionalMothers*myOffspringPerMotherYearly)/2;
00791   float myFemalesStepTwo = (myAdditionalMothers*myOffspringPerMotherYearly)/2;
00792   float myTotalMothers = myMothersNeededStepOne+myAdditionalMothers;
00793   float myTotalMales = myMalesStepOne+myMalesStepTwo;
00794   float myTotalFemales = myFemalesStepOne-myFemalesStepTwo;
00795   float myTotalJuveniles = myTotalMales+myTotalFemales;
00796   //float myTotalMothersValueRequired = myTotalMothers * (myAnimal.gestating()/1000.) * 365.;
00797   //float myTotalJuvenilesValueRequired = myTotalJuveniles * (myAnimal.juvenile()/1000.) * 365.;
00798   //float myValueNeededToFeedAnimals = myTotalMothersValueRequired + myTotalJuvenilesValueRequired;
00799   myHerdSize.first = myTotalMothers;
00800   myHerdSize.second = myTotalJuveniles;
00801   qDebug() << "LaModel::HerdSize: " << myHerdSize;
00802 
00803   return myHerdSize;
00804 }
00805 
00806 QString LaModel::reportForAnimal(QString theAnimalGuid)
00807 { // this is the animal model calculation results
00808   QString myReport;
00809   LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(theAnimalGuid);
00810   float myAnimalProductionTarget=getProductionTargetsAnimals( theAnimalGuid, static_cast <int>(mCaloriesProvidedByMeatMap.value(theAnimalGuid)));
00811   float myAnimalsRequired=(myAnimalProductionTarget / myAnimal.killWeight()) / (myAnimal.usableMeat()*.01);
00812   float myBirthsPerYear = 365.0 / (myAnimal.gestationTime() + myAnimal.estrousCycle() + (myAnimal.weaningAge() * 7.0));
00813   float myOffspringPerMotherYearly = myBirthsPerYear * myAnimal.youngPerBirth() * (1.0-(0.01*myAnimal.deathRate()));
00814   float myMothersNeededStepOne = myAnimalsRequired/myOffspringPerMotherYearly;
00815   float myMalesStepOne = (myMothersNeededStepOne * myOffspringPerMotherYearly)/2;
00816   float myFemalesStepOne = myMalesStepOne;
00817   float myMotherReplacementsPerYear = myMothersNeededStepOne/myAnimal.breedingExpectancy();
00818   float myAdditionalMothers = (myMotherReplacementsPerYear/myOffspringPerMotherYearly)*2;
00819   float myMalesStepTwo = (myAdditionalMothers*myOffspringPerMotherYearly)/2;
00820   float myFemalesStepTwo = (myAdditionalMothers*myOffspringPerMotherYearly)/2;
00821   float myTotalMothers = myMothersNeededStepOne+myAdditionalMothers;
00822   float myTotalMales = myMalesStepOne+myMalesStepTwo;
00823   float myTotalFemales = myFemalesStepOne-myFemalesStepTwo;//Changed to + because the culled mothers would be eaten
00824   float myTotalJuveniles = myTotalMales+myTotalFemales;
00825   float myTotalMothersValueRequired = myTotalMothers * (myAnimal.gestating()/1000.) * 365.; // kcalories
00826   float myTotalJuvenilesValueRequired = myTotalJuveniles * (myAnimal.juvenile()/1000.) * 365.; // kcalories
00827   float myValueNeededToFeedAnimals = myTotalMothersValueRequired + myTotalJuvenilesValueRequired;
00828 
00829   myReport += "Details for " + myAnimal.name();
00830   myReport += "\n";
00831   myReport += "Calorie Target: " + QString::number(mCaloriesProvidedByMeatMap.value(theAnimalGuid));
00832   myReport += "\n";
00833   myReport += "Prod'n Target(Kg): " + QString::number(myAnimalProductionTarget);
00834   myReport += "\n";
00835   myReport += "slaughter animals: " + QString::number(myAnimalsRequired);
00836   myReport += "\n";
00837   myReport += "Births/Year: " + QString::number(myBirthsPerYear);
00838   myReport += "\n";
00839   myReport += "Offspring/Mother: " + QString::number(myOffspringPerMotherYearly);
00840   myReport += "\n";
00841   myReport += "Adult Females: " + QString::number(myTotalMothers);
00842   myReport += "\n";
00843   myReport += "Juveniles: " + QString::number(myTotalJuveniles);
00844   myReport += "\n";
00845   myReport += "Value (Kg) Req'd Adult: " + QString::number(static_cast <int>(myTotalMothersValueRequired));
00846   myReport += "\n";
00847   myReport += "Value (Kg) Req'd Juveniles: " + QString::number(static_cast <int>(myTotalJuvenilesValueRequired));
00848   myReport += "\n";
00849   myReport += "Total Value (Kg) Req'd: " + QString::number(static_cast <int> (myValueNeededToFeedAnimals));
00850   myReport += "\n";
00851   myReport += "Area Target: " + QString::number(mAreaTargetsAnimalsMap.value(theAnimalGuid));
00852   myReport += "\n";
00853   logMessage(myReport.toLocal8Bit());
00854   return myReport;
00855 }
00856 
00857 int LaModel::getTotalCaloriesFromDairy()
00858 {  
00859   //mCalcsAnimalsMap.clear();
00860   //mCalcsCropsMap.clear();
00861   initialiseCaloriesProvidedByMeatMap();
00862   //initialiseCaloriesProvidedByMilkMap();
00863   initialiseCaloriesProvidedByCropsMap();
00864     
00865   int myCalorieTotal = 0;
00866   qDebug() << "method ==> void LaModel::getTotalCaloriesFromDairy()--------------------------------------------------";
00867   initialiseCaloriesProvidedByMilkMap();
00868   qDebug() << "Entering While Loop" ;
00869 
00870   QMapIterator<QString, QString > myAnimalIterator(mAnimalsMap);
00871   while (myAnimalIterator.hasNext())
00872   {
00873     myAnimalIterator.next();
00874     QString myAnimalGuid = myAnimalIterator.key();
00875     QString myAnimalParameterGuid = mAnimalsMap.value(myAnimalGuid);
00876     myCalorieTotal += caloriesProvidedByTheMilkOfTheAnimal(myAnimalParameterGuid, myAnimalGuid);
00877     qDebug() << " In While Loop";
00878 
00879     qDebug() << " Animal Guid: " << myAnimalGuid;
00880     qDebug() << " Calories Provided by Milk: " << caloriesProvidedByTheMilkOfTheAnimal(myAnimalParameterGuid, myAnimalGuid);
00881   }
00882   qDebug() << "Left WhileLoop DAIRY !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!: ";
00883   qDebug() << "myCalorieTotal=================================" << myCalorieTotal;
00884 
00885   return myCalorieTotal;
00886 }
00887 
00888 int LaModel::getFallowLandForACrop(QString theCropParameterGuid, int theAreaTarget)
00889 {
00890   logMessage("method ==> int LaModel::getFallowLandForACrop(QString theCropParameterGuid, int theAreaTarget)");
00891   LaCropParameter myCropParameter = LaUtils::getCropParameter(theCropParameterGuid);
00892   float myAvailableFallow = myCropParameter.fallowRatio() * theAreaTarget;
00893   int myReturnValue = static_cast<int>(myAvailableFallow);
00894   logMessage("crop parameter: " + myCropParameter.name().toLocal8Bit());
00895   logMessage("fallow land for the crop: " + QString::number(myReturnValue).toLocal8Bit());
00896   return myReturnValue;
00897 }

00998 void LaModel::initialiseAreaTargetsCropsMap()
00999 {
01000   logMessage("method ==> void LaModel::initialiseAreaTargetsCropsMap()");
01001   mCommonCropLand = 0;
01002   mAreaTargetsCropsMap.clear();
01003   QMapIterator<QString, QString > myCropIterator(mCropsMap);
01004   while (myCropIterator.hasNext())
01005   {
01006     myCropIterator.next();
01007     QString myCropGuid = myCropIterator.key();
01008     int myProductionTarget = static_cast<int>(mProductionRequiredCropsMap.value(myCropGuid));
01009     int myAreaTarget = getAreaTargetsCrops(myCropGuid, myProductionTarget);
01010     mAreaTargetsCropsMap.insert(myCropGuid,myAreaTarget);
01011 
01012     QString myCropParameterGuid = mCropsMap.value(myCropGuid);
01013     LaCropParameter myCropParameter = LaUtils::getCropParameter(myCropParameterGuid);
01014 
01015     mCommonCropLand = (myCropParameter.useCommonLand() == true) ? mCommonCropLand + myAreaTarget : mCommonCropLand;
01016   }
01017     mAreaTargetsCropsMap.insert("CommonTarget",static_cast<int>(mCommonCropLand));
01018 }

01033 void LaModel::initialiseCalcsAnimalsMap()
01034 { // this also returns an area target for common land
01035   //mCalcsAnimalsMap.clear();
01036   //iterate through animals
01037   QMapIterator<QString, QString > myAnimalIterator(mAnimalsMap);
01038   while (myAnimalIterator.hasNext())
01039   {
01040     myAnimalIterator.next();
01041     QString myAnimalGuid = myAnimalIterator.key();
01042     QString myReport = reportForAnimal(myAnimalGuid);
01043     logMessage(myReport.toLocal8Bit());
01044     mCalcsAnimalsMap.insert(myAnimalGuid, myReport);
01045   }
01046   mCalcsAnimalsMap.insert("Common Land", QString::number(mCommonGrazingLandAreaTarget));
01047 }
01048 
01049 void LaModel::initialiseAreaTargetsAnimalsMap()
01050 { // this also returns an area target for common land
01051   logMessage("method ==> void LaModel::initialiseAreaTargetsAnimalsMap()");
01052   logMessage("Common Grazing Land Value: " + QString::number(static_cast<int>(mCommonGrazingValue)).toLocal8Bit());
01053   mAreaTargetsAnimalsMap.clear();
01054   mCommonGrazingLandValueTarget= 0;
01055   //iterate through animals
01056   QMapIterator<QString, QString > myAnimalIterator(mAnimalsMap);
01057   while (myAnimalIterator.hasNext())
01058   {
01059     myAnimalIterator.next();
01060     QString myAnimalGuid = myAnimalIterator.key();
01061     QString myAnimalParameterGuid = myAnimalIterator.value();
01062     LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(myAnimalGuid);
01063     LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter = LaUtils::getAnimalParameter(myAnimalParameterGuid);
01064     logMessage("Animal: " + myAnimal.name().toLocal8Bit());
01065     AreaUnits mySpecificAreaUnits = myAnimalParameter.areaUnits();
01066 
01067     float myValueSpecific = LaUtils::convertAreaToHectares(mySpecificAreaUnits, myAnimalParameter.ValueSpecificGrazingLand());
01068 
01069     float myValueCommon   = mCommonGrazingValue;
01070     qDebug() << "   +++   myValueSpecific = " << myValueSpecific;
01071     qDebug() << "   +++   myValueCommon   = " << mCommonGrazingValue;
01072 
01073     // check to see if this animal needs any additional food
01074     if (mValueMap[myAnimalGuid] > 0) // yes, the animal needs more food
01075     {
01076       logMessage("Animal Needs more Food!");
01077       // figure out how much grazing land is needed to supply this many calories
01078       LandBeingGrazed myLandBeingGrazed;
01079       //int myValueCommonGrazingLand = myAnimalParameter.ValueCommonGrazingLand();
01080 
01081       myLandBeingGrazed =  (myAnimalParameter.useCommonGrazingLand()==1) ? Common:Unique;
01082 
01083       switch (myLandBeingGrazed)
01084       {
01085         case Common:
01086              {
01087                logMessage("Animal is grazing Common Land so required Value is added to common land Value target");
01088                mCommonGrazingLandValueTarget += static_cast<int>(mValueMap.value(myAnimalGuid));
01089                logMessage("Cumulative Value Target for Common Land: " + QString::number(mCommonGrazingLandValueTarget));
01090                float myCommonTarget = mValueMap.value(myAnimalGuid) / myValueCommon;
01091                mAreaTargetsAnimalsMap[myAnimalGuid] = static_cast<int>(myCommonTarget);
01092                break;
01093              }
01094         case Unique:
01095              {
01096                logMessage("Animal is grazing Unique Land so required Value is divided by Value of unique grazing land");
01097                float myTarget1 = mValueMap.value(myAnimalGuid) / myValueSpecific;
01098                mAreaTargetsAnimalsMap[myAnimalGuid] = static_cast<int>(myTarget1);
01099                logMessage("The Area Target is: " + QString::number(static_cast<int>(myTarget1)).toLocal8Bit());
01100                break;
01101              }
01102       }
01103       //int myCaloriesNeeded = static_cast<int>(mValueMap.value(myAnimalGuid));
01104 
01105       //mProductionRequiredAnimalsMap.insert(myAnimalGuid,getProductionTargetsAnimals(myAnimalGuid, myProductionTarget));
01106     }
01107     else // the animal needs no additional food
01108     {
01109       logMessage("Animal needs no additional food.");
01110       mAreaTargetsAnimalsMap[myAnimalGuid] = 0;
01111     }
01112     // CHECK FOR AREA UNIT CONVERSION HERE!
01113     mCommonGrazingLandAreaTarget = mCommonGrazingLandValueTarget / mCommonGrazingValue;
01114 
01115   }
01116     logMessage(" ");
01117     logMessage("The Final Common Grazing Land Area Target is: " + QString::number(static_cast<int>(mCommonGrazingLandAreaTarget)).toLocal8Bit());
01118     logMessage(" ");
01119     mAreaTargetsAnimalsMap.insert("CommonTarget",static_cast<int>(mCommonGrazingLandAreaTarget));
01120 }

01122 Status LaModel::fallowStatus() const
01123 {
01124   return mFallowStatus;
01125 }
01126 
01127 float LaModel::fallowRatio() const
01128 {
01129   return mFallowStatus;
01130 }
01131 
01132 void LaModel::allocateFallowGrazingLand()
01133 {
01134   logMessage("method ==> void LaModel::allocateFallowGrazingLand()");
01135   // We need to divide the available fallow land amongst the animals
01136   // that graze fallow. We split the animal breeds by fallow land
01137   // access priority (high / medium and low priority).
01138   // e.g. We have 10 animal breeds, 6 of which graze fallow,
01139   // caw and horse are high priority, shee and pig medium,
01140   // chicken and gooxe low.
01141 
01142   int myHighPriorityCount=0, myMediumPriorityCount=0, myLowPriorityCount=0;
01143   int   myHighPriorityValue=0;
01144   int   myMediumPriorityValue=0;
01145   int   myLowPriorityValue=0;
01146   // put starting caloric requirements of all used animals into a map
01147   // for reduction due to grazing of fallow crop land
01148   // initialiseValueMap();
01149 
01150   int myTotalFallowValue=0;
01151 
01152   // Count the Animals in each Priority Level and sum their calorie requirements
01153   QMapIterator<QString, QString > myAnimalIterator(mAnimalsMap);
01154   while (myAnimalIterator.hasNext())
01155   {
01156     myAnimalIterator.next();
01157     QString myAnimalGuid = myAnimalIterator.key();
01158     QString myAnimalParameterGuid = myAnimalIterator.value();
01159     LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(myAnimalGuid);
01160     LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter = LaUtils::getAnimalParameter(myAnimalParameterGuid);
01161 
01162     switch (myAnimalParameter.fallowUsage())
01163     {
01164       case  High:
01165             myHighPriorityCount++;
01166             myHighPriorityValue += requiredValue(myAnimalGuid);
01167             break;
01168       case  Medium:
01169             myMediumPriorityCount++;
01170             myMediumPriorityValue += requiredValue(myAnimalGuid);
01171             break;
01172       case  Low:
01173             myLowPriorityCount++;
01174             myLowPriorityValue += requiredValue(myAnimalGuid);
01175             break;
01176       case  None:
01177             break;
01178       default:
01179             break;
01180     } //switch
01181 
01182   } //while animal count
01183   logMessage("High Priority Animals: " + QString::number(myHighPriorityCount).toLocal8Bit() );
01184   logMessage("Medium Priority Animals: " + QString::number(myMediumPriorityCount).toLocal8Bit() );
01185   logMessage("Low Priority Animals: " + QString::number(myLowPriorityCount).toLocal8Bit() );
01186 
01187   logMessage("High Priority Animal Calorie requirements: " + QString::number(myHighPriorityValue).toLocal8Bit() );
01188   logMessage("Medium Priority Animal Calorie requirements: " + QString::number(myMediumPriorityValue).toLocal8Bit() );
01189   logMessage("Low Priority Animal Calorie requirements: " + QString::number(myLowPriorityValue).toLocal8Bit() );
01190 
01191   //  iterate through crops to determine the total calories available to animals
01192   //  by grazing fallow crop land
01193 
01194   QMapIterator<QString, QString > myCropIterator(mCropsMap);
01195   while (myCropIterator.hasNext())
01196   {
01197     myCropIterator.next();
01198     QString myCropGuid = myCropIterator.key();
01199     QString myCropParameterGuid = myCropIterator.value();
01200     LaCrop myCrop = LaUtils::getCrop(myCropGuid);
01201     LaCropParameter myCropParameter = LaUtils::getCropParameter(myCropParameterGuid);
01202 
01203     float myCropPercent = 0.01 * myCropParameter.percentTameCrop();
01204     float myCropCalorieTarget = caloriesFromCrops() * myCropPercent; // already kcalories
01205     float myCropProductionTarget = myCropCalorieTarget / (myCrop.cropCalories()/1000.);
01206 
01207     AreaUnits myCropAreaUnits = myCrop.areaUnits();
01208     int myCropYield = LaUtils::convertAreaToHectares(myCropAreaUnits, static_cast<int> (myCrop.cropYield()));
01209     //QString myCropParameterGuid = mCropsMap.value(theCropGuid);
01210     //LaCropParameter myCropParameter = LaUtils::getCropParameter(myCropParameterGuid);
01211     float myFallowRatio = myCropParameter.fallowRatio();
01212     float myFallowArea = (myCropProductionTarget / myCropYield) * myFallowRatio;
01213 
01214     AreaUnits myFallowAreaUnits = myCropParameter.areaUnits();
01215     int myFallowValueBefore = myCropParameter.fallowValue();
01216     int myFallowValue = LaUtils::convertAreaToHectares(myFallowAreaUnits, myFallowValueBefore);
01217     float myAvailableFallowValue = myFallowRatio * myFallowArea * myFallowValue;
01218 
01219     myTotalFallowValue += static_cast<int>(myAvailableFallowValue);
01220   } // while crop iterator
01221   logMessage("Total Available Fallow Calories before adjustments: " + QString::number(myTotalFallowValue).toLocal8Bit());
01222 
01223   // The following three if statements process all of the animals which
01224   // utilize fallow cropland as grazing land.  It first checks that there
01225   // is fallow land available, and next allocates the the fallow based on
01226   // the animals fallow access priority
01227 
01228   // HIGH priority animals get allocated fallow cropland
01229   if (myTotalFallowValue > 0)
01230   {
01231     Priority myPriority = High;
01232     int myLeftoverCalories = doTheFallowAllocation(myPriority, myTotalFallowValue, myHighPriorityValue);
01233     logMessage("Remaining Fallow Calories after HIGH adjustments: " + QString::number(myLeftoverCalories).toLocal8Bit());
01234     myTotalFallowValue = myLeftoverCalories;
01235   }
01236   // MEDIUM priority animals get allocated fallow cropland
01237   if (myTotalFallowValue > 0)
01238   {
01239     Priority myPriority = Medium;
01240     int myLeftoverCalories = doTheFallowAllocation(myPriority, myTotalFallowValue, myMediumPriorityValue);
01241     logMessage("Remaining Fallow Calories after MED adjustments: " + QString::number(myLeftoverCalories).toLocal8Bit());
01242     myTotalFallowValue = myLeftoverCalories;
01243   }
01244   // LOW priority animals get allocated fallow cropland
01245   if (myTotalFallowValue > 0)
01246   {
01247     Priority myPriority = Low;
01248     int myLeftoverCalories = doTheFallowAllocation(myPriority, myTotalFallowValue, myLowPriorityValue);
01249     logMessage("Remaining Fallow Calories after LOW adjustments: " + QString::number(myLeftoverCalories).toLocal8Bit());
01250     myTotalFallowValue = myLeftoverCalories;
01251   }
01252   //int myReturnValue = static_cast<int>(myTotalFallowValue);
01253   //return myReturnValue;
01254 }
01255 
01256 
01257 /* int LaModel::adjustForFodder(LaFoodSource theFoodSources, int theCalsRequired)
01258 {
01259   // the values given here are percentage of diet, so are easily calculated.
01260   int myStrawChaffPercentOfDiet = theFoodSources.fodder();
01261   int myGrainPercentOfDiet = theFoodSources.grain();
01262 
01263 } */
01264 
01265 int LaModel::doTheFallowAllocation
01266       (
01267         Priority thePriority,
01268         int theAvailableFallowValue,
01269         int theValueNeeded
01270       )
01271 {
01272   qDebug() << "Value Map: " << mValueMap;
01273   // when the total number of calories needed by the animals
01274   // is taken away from the total available calories (from crop fallow),
01275   // there will be one of two results.
01276   // 1. the result will be <=0, meaning that additional sources of
01277   //    food is required for the animals.  (fodder or grazing land)
01278   // 2. the result will be > 0, meaning that there is enough food value
01279   //    in the crop fallow to completely feed the animals.
01280   float myTotalFallowValue = theAvailableFallowValue - theValueNeeded;
01281   qDebug() << "myTotalFallowValue: "  << myTotalFallowValue;
01282   // set up the conditions for the fallow allocation...
01283   // there is either enough fallow to feed the animal completely
01284   // or not enough to feed them completely.  If there is enough,
01285   // the animal will not be requiring any additional source of
01286   // calories.  In other words, we won't be needing to graze them
01287   // on any other land besides the crop fallow.
01288   Status myFallowStatus;
01289   myFallowStatus = (myTotalFallowValue > 0) ? MoreThanEnoughToCompletelySatisfy : NotEnoughToCompletelySatisfy;
01290   QString myFallowStatusString = (myFallowStatus!=NotEnoughToCompletelySatisfy) ? "More than Enough" : "Not Enough";
01291   logMessage("Fallow Status: " + myFallowStatusString);
01292   qDebug () << "FallowStatus: " << myFallowStatus;
01293   switch (myFallowStatus)
01294   {
01295     case  MoreThanEnoughToCompletelySatisfy:
01296           {
01297             logMessage("MoreThanEnoughToCompletelySatisfy");
01298             // because there is leftover calories available to feed more critters, this
01299             // shows that all of the animals caloric requirements are met with crop fallow
01300             // and require no more feed so their values in the QMap will be set to 0
01301             QMapIterator<QString, QString > myAnimalIterator(mAnimalsMap);
01302             while (myAnimalIterator.hasNext())
01303             {
01304               myAnimalIterator.next();
01305 
01306               QString myAnimalGuid = myAnimalIterator.key();
01307               QString myAnimalParameterGuid = myAnimalIterator.value();
01308               LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(myAnimalGuid);
01309               LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter = LaUtils::getAnimalParameter(myAnimalParameterGuid);
01310 
01311               if (myAnimalParameter.fallowUsage()==thePriority)
01312               {
01313                 mValueMap[myAnimalGuid] = 0;
01314               } //endif (fallowUsage(myAnimalGuid)
01315 
01316              } // while animal iterating
01317              // myTotalFallowValue += theValueNeeded;
01318              break;
01319           }
01320 
01321     case  NotEnoughToCompletelySatisfy:
01322           {
01323             logMessage("CASE: NotEnoughToCompletelySatisfy");
01324             // because there ARE NO leftover Value available to feed more critters, this
01325             // shows that NOT ALL of the animals requirements are met with crop fallow
01326             // and therefore require more feed so their values in the QMap will be adjusted
01327             QMapIterator<QString, QString > myAnimalIterator(mAnimalsMap);
01328             while (myAnimalIterator.hasNext())
01329             {
01330               myAnimalIterator.next();
01331               logMessage("    Iterating through Animals looking for a match");
01332 
01333               QString myAnimalGuid = myAnimalIterator.key();
01334               QString myAnimalParameterGuid = myAnimalIterator.value();
01335               LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(myAnimalGuid);
01336               LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter = LaUtils::getAnimalParameter(myAnimalParameterGuid);
01337               int myCurrentAnimalsValue = mValueMap.value( myAnimalGuid );
01338               logMessage("       Current Animal: " + myAnimal.name());
01339               qDebug() << "        theValueNeeded: " << theValueNeeded;
01340               qDebug() << "        theAvailableFallowValue: " << theAvailableFallowValue;
01341               qDebug() << "        myCurrentAnimalsValue: " << myCurrentAnimalsValue;
01342               if (myAnimalParameter.fallowUsage()==thePriority)
01343               {
01344                 double myAllottedValue = ((myCurrentAnimalsValue / static_cast<float>(theValueNeeded)) * theAvailableFallowValue);
01345                 logMessage("Adjusting calories required by: " + myAnimal.name());
01346                 qDebug() << "myAllottedValue: " << myAllottedValue;
01347                 logMessage("Allotted Value from fallow are: " + QString::number(myAllottedValue));
01348                 logMessage("Original Value target was: " + QString::number(mValueMap.value(myAnimalGuid)));
01349                 float myNewValueTarget = mValueMap.value(myAnimalGuid) - myAllottedValue;
01350                 logMessage("New Value target is: " + QString::number(myNewValueTarget));
01351                 mValueMap [myAnimalGuid] = static_cast<int>(myNewValueTarget);
01352                 myTotalFallowValue += static_cast<int>(myAllottedValue);
01353               } // endif (fallowUsage(myAnimalGuid)==High)
01354 
01355             } // while animal iterating
01356             logMessage("After allocation, total available Value from fallow: " + QString::number(myTotalFallowValue).toLocal8Bit());
01357             myTotalFallowValue = 0;
01358             logMessage("WHICH HAS NOW BEEN SET TO 0");
01359             break;
01360           }
01361 
01362     default:
01363           break;
01364   } //switch
01365   return static_cast<int>(myTotalFallowValue);
01366 }
01367 
01368 
01369 
01371  // The following is all for generating reports on calculation results //
01373 
01374 QString LaModel::toHtmlCalorieCropTargets()
01375 {
01376   // This method returns a QString for an xml file containing the calorie
01377   // targets for each crop from mCaloriesProvidedByCropsMap
01378 
01379   // Loop through the mCaloriesProvidedByCropsMap
01380   QString myString;
01381   myString += QString("<h3> Crop Calorie Targets</h3>\n");
01382   myString += QString("<table>");
01383   myString += QString("  <tr>\n");
01384   myString += QString("    <th>\n");
01385   myString += QString("      Crop\n");
01386   myString += QString("    </th>\n");
01387   myString += QString("    <th>\n");
01388   myString += QString("      kCalories\n");
01389   myString += QString("    </th>\n");
01390   myString += QString("  </tr>\n");
01391 
01392   QMapIterator<QString, int> myCropIterator (mCaloriesProvidedByCropsMap);
01393   while (myCropIterator.hasNext())
01394   {
01395     myCropIterator.next();
01396     QString myCropGuid = myCropIterator.key();
01397     int myCalorieTarget = static_cast <int>(myCropIterator.value());
01398     LaCrop myCrop = LaUtils::getCrop(myCropGuid);
01399     LaCropParameter myCropParameter = LaUtils::getCropParameter(mCropsMap.value(myCropGuid));
01400 
01401     // add to the QString to create the html file
01402 
01403     myString += QString("  <tr>\n");
01404     myString += QString("    <td>\n");

01572 QString LaModel::toHtmlAreaCropTargets()
01573 {
01574   // This method returns a QString for an xml file containing the production
01575   // targets for each crop from mAreaTargetsCropsMap
01576 
01577   // Loop through the mAreaTargetsCropsMap
01578   QString myString;
01579   myString += QString("<h3> Crop Area Targets</h3>\n");
01580   myString += QString("<P STYLE=\"margin-bottom: 0in\"><BR>\n");
01581   myString += QString("\n");
01582   myString += QString("<table>");
01583   myString += QString("  <COL WIDTH=64*>\n");
01584   myString += QString("  <COL WIDTH=16*>\n");
01585   myString += QString("  <tr>\n");
01586   myString += QString("    <th>\n");
01587   myString += QString("      Crop\n");
01588   myString += QString("    </th>\n");
01589   myString += QString("    <th>\n");
01590   myString += QString("      Area\n");
01591   myString += QString("    </th>\n");
01592   myString += QString("  </tr>\n");
01593   QMapIterator<QString, int> myCropIterator (mAreaTargetsCropsMap);
01594   while (myCropIterator.hasNext())
01595   {
01596     myCropIterator.next();
01597     QString myCropGuid = myCropIterator.key();
01598     if (myCropGuid != "CommonTarget")
01599     {
01600       int myAreaTarget = static_cast <int>(myCropIterator.value());
01601       LaCrop myCrop = LaUtils::getCrop(myCropGuid);
01602       LaCropParameter myCropParameter = LaUtils::getCropParameter(mCropsMap.value(myCropGuid));
01603       // add to the QString to create the xml file
01604       myString += QString("  <tr>\n");
01605       myString += QString("    <td>\n");
01606       myString += QString("      " + LaUtils::xmlEncode(myCrop.name()) + "\n");
01607       myString += QString("    </td>\n");
01608       myString += QString("    <td>\n");
01609       myString += QString("      " + QString::number(myAreaTarget) + "\n");
01610       myString += QString("    </td>\n");
01611       myString += QString("  </tr>\n");
01612     }
01613     else
01614     {
01615       QString myAreaTarget = QString::number(mAreaTargetsCropsMap.value("CommonTarget"));
01616       myString += QString("  <tr>\n");
01617       myString += QString("    <td>\n");
01618       myString += QString("      CommonTarget\n");
01619       myString += QString("    </td>\n");
01620       myString += QString("    <td>\n");
01621       myString += QString("      " + myAreaTarget + "\n");
01622       myString += QString("    </td>\n");
01623       myString += QString("  </tr>\n");
01624     }
01625   } // while crop iterator
01626 
01627     myString += QString("</table>\n");
01628   return myString;
01629 }
01630 
01631 QString LaModel::toHtmlAreaAnimalTargets()
01632 {
01633   // This method returns a QString for an xml file containing the production
01634   // targets for each animal from mAreaTargetsAnimalsMap
01635 
01636   // Loop through the mAreaTargetsAnimalsMap
01637   QString myString;
01638   myString += QString("<h3> Animal Area Targets</h3>\n");
01639   myString += QString("\n");
01640   myString += QString("<table>");
01641   myString += QString("  <tr>\n");
01642   myString += QString("    <th>\n");
01643   myString += QString("      Animal\n");
01644   myString += QString("    </th>\n");
01645   myString += QString("    <th>\n");
01646   myString += QString("      Area\n");
01647   myString += QString("    </th>\n");
01648   myString += QString("  </tr>\n");
01649   QMapIterator<QString, int> myAnimalIterator (mAreaTargetsAnimalsMap);
01650   while (myAnimalIterator.hasNext())
01651   {
01652     myAnimalIterator.next();
01653     QString myAnimalGuid = myAnimalIterator.key();
01654     if (myAnimalGuid != "CommonTarget")
01655     {
01656       int myAreaTargetUnchanged = static_cast <int>(myAnimalIterator.value());
01657       LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(myAnimalGuid);
01658       LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter = LaUtils::getAnimalParameter(mAnimalsMap.value(myAnimalGuid));
01659       int myAreaTarget = LaUtils::convertAreaToHectares(myAnimalParameter.areaUnits(), myAreaTargetUnchanged);
01660       // add to the QString to create the xml file
01661       myString += QString("  <tr>\n");
01662       myString += QString("    <td>\n");
01663       myString += QString("      " + LaUtils::xmlEncode(myAnimal.name()) + "\n");
01664       myString += QString("    </td>\n");
01665       myString += QString("    <td>\n");
01666       myString += QString("      " + QString::number(myAreaTarget) + "\n");
01667       myString += QString("    </td>\n");
01668       myString += QString("  </tr>\n");
01669     }
01670     else
01671     {
01672       QString myAreaTarget = QString::number(mAreaTargetsAnimalsMap.value("CommonTarget"));
01673       myString += QString("  <tr>\n");
01674       myString += QString("    <td>\n");
01675       myString += QString("      CommonTarget\n");
01676       myString += QString("    </td>\n");
01677       myString += QString("    <td>\n");
01678       myString += QString("      " + myAreaTarget + "\n");
01679       myString += QString("    </td>\n");
01680       myString += QString("  </tr>\n");
01681     }
01682   }
01683 
01684     myString += QString("</table>\n");
01685   return myString;
01686 }
